meanings.sent1: The path was unblocked, allowing us to walk freely.
meanings.sent2: The unblocked road made our journey much smoother.
meanings.sent3: The unblocked door surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her unblocked creativity flowed like a river.
meanings.sent5: The unblocked drain gurgled happily after being cleared.

meanings.definition: Freed from being blocked or obstructed
meanings.sent1: The unblocked website gave access to all the information we needed.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved when her sinuses unblocked after using the nasal spray.
meanings.sent3: The unblocked puzzle pieces finally fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His unblocked emotions poured out in tears of joy.
meanings.sent5: The unblocked traffic flowed smoothly through the intersection.
